projects.title: AudioSieve
projects.blurb: AudioSieve is a PyQt5-based audio workstation for scanning, organizing, tagging, classifying, and denoising audio libraries. It integrates FFmpeg, Mutagen, VLC, and DSP modules (EQ, channel strip, filters) to manage metadata, organize files, normalize artwork, and provide playback with visualization and streaming support. The system is designed for scale, preserving privacy while offering non-destructive sorting and cataloging of audio collections.

projects.title: T4NP (The 4 Noble Pillars)
projects.blurb: (RedPanda, AmurTiger, ManchurianTiger & PersianLeopard): Preventative source-code protection suite that thwarts exfiltration and theft by embedding jurisdictional encoding/indexing layers (native-illegal index schemes) tailored to resist automated parsing and reuse in high-risk jurisdictions (China, Russia, DPRK, IRN).

projects.title: RedPanda
projects.blurb: T4NP module (PRC): jurisdiction-encoded source-protection layer that embeds native-illegal index schemes to resist parsing, reuse, and exfiltration in China.

projects.title: AmurTiger
projects.blurb: T4NP module (Russia): jurisdiction-encoded source-protection layer tuned to Russian legal/linguistic constraints; frustrates automated tooling and redistribution.

projects.title: ManchurianTiger
projects.blurb: T4NP module (DPRK): native-illegal indexing and codepath obfuscation rules that deter analysis, compilation, and reuse within North Korean contexts.

projects.title: PersianLeopard
projects.blurb: T4NP module (Iran): jurisdiction-specific encoding/lexical fences and build-chain tripwires to prevent compliant reuse and automated refactoring in IRN.
